p: The enzymes activities of ascorbate peroxidase (APX), catalase (CAT), and superoxide dismutase (SOD) were quantified in leaves tissues according to Zhang and Kirkham ( 1996) and Elansary et al. ( 2017). ROS accumulation was determined by quantifying H 2O 2 composition in leaves following Elansary et al. ( 2017) and using the Beyotime Colorimetric Assay Kit (Beyotime, China).
